text:
Champions League
Chelsea - Ajax: which channel and what time?
Chelsea receives Ajax Amsterdam, for the fourth day of this Group H Champions League. A meeting to follow in full and live on French television this Tuesday, November 5, 2019. On which channel and what time? Answer in this article.
05 Nov 2019, 04:00 by Hugo Deloraine



It is a duel at the top between these two teams in this group H. Chelsea hosts Ajax Amsterdam for this fourth day of the Champions League. In the first leg, 2 weeks ago, Chelsea won with a goal from Michy Batshuayi which allowed his team to join Ajax at the top of this group H, tied with 6 points. The meeting will take place at Stamford Bridge.







The schedule of group H




Chelsea + 16 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1st day - September 17th

Ajax Amsterdam 3-0 Lille
Chelsea 0-1 Valencia

2nd day - October 2nd

Lille 1-2 Chelsea
Valencia 0-3 Ajax Amsterdam

3rd day - 23rd of October

Ajax Amsterdam 0-1 Chelsea
Lille 1-1 Valencia

4th day - November 5th

9 pm: Valence - Lille
9 pm: Chelsea - Ajax Amsterdam

5th day - 27th November

18h55: Valencia - Chelsea
9 pm: Lille - Ajax Amsterdam

6th day - December 10th

9 pm: Chelsea - Lille
9 pm: Ajax Amsterdam - Valencia

The classification of group H




Ajax + 16 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport


Chelsea - 6 pts (+1)
Ajax - 6 pts (+5)
Valencia - 4 pts
Lille - 1 pt

The first two of the group are qualified in the round of 16. The third is donated to the Europa League. The last definitely leaves the European Cup for this season.
Chelsea-Ajax on television




Michy Batshuayi and Veltman + 16 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This match of the fourth day of the Champions League between Chelsea and Ajax is to be followed in full on French television this Tuesday, November 5, 2019, from 21:00 on the RMC Sport 5 channel.
